title: Stuffed vegetables

ingredients.content: 10 g extra virgin olive oil plus extra for greasing and drizzling

preparations.content: Cut courgettes and aubergines in half lengthwise. Cut onions in half across the middle. Arrange all vegetables cut side down in Varoma dish and tray (ensuring that some holes are left clear).
Place water in mixing bowl, place covered Varoma into position, then steam <b>25 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside and empty mixing bowl.
Set vegetables aside to cool (approx. 10 minutes). Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a baking dish and set aside.
Using a tablespoon, scoop out flesh of cooked vegetables, leaving the outside intact for stuffing later. Reserve flesh for use in stuffing mixture.
Place olive oil, breadcrumbs, milk, basil, egg, salt, pepper and reserved vegetable flesh in mixing bowl then mix <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Place vegetable skins, hollow side up, in prepared baking dish. Fill with stuffing mixture and drizzle with remaining 1 Tbsp oil. Bake for 20-30 minutes (180°C) until golden brown. Serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: If onions are too small for stuffing, replace with 1 more aubergine or courgette.
Add <b>30 g<b> grated Parmesan cheese in <b>step 5<b>.
